subject_information.address: 49331 Lewis Views Apt. 516, Lake Maryshire, DE 59549

suspicious_activity.narrative: Customer CUST_0111, a high-risk client, conducted 121 transactions totaling $386,834.91 with a peak transaction of $76,517.25. Notably, on 2025-07-30, outgoing wire transfers of $8,906.70 and $12,689.70 were made to Nash, Mueller and Russell and Tran-Burns, respectively. Activity suggests potential structuring and layering, warranting suspicion of money laundering. Financial institution initiated SAR drafting under the Bank Secrecy Act.
key_indicators: Large amounts just below reporting thresholds
